channel.title: Tops on Zempty0's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Zempty0's Blog

item.description: Huabing Zhao is an ICT veteran with a passion for open source. He has a solid experience in the telecommunication and information technology industry for more than 17 years. Throughout his career, he has built a number of large-scale, cross-country OSS/BSS platforms/systems and operation tools, most of them are still running in productions. He also loves open source and has been contributing to a variety of open source projects, including Istio(Service Mesh https://istio.
